Here are some things we use in conferences.
Get your name tag at the registration desk.
Bring your desktop computer in for backup.
Put your presentation on the external hard drive.
Call the technician to troubleshoot your laptop.
Let's use stackable chairs because they're easier to carry around.
Make sure you put your nicknames on the name tags.
Should we give participants gift bags?
Don't put the teleprompter too far from the speaker.
Move the microphone stand to the center of the stage.
